title: Hypermedia-Based Nursing Practice Education: Pregnancy Risk Classification and Care Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Education program for practicing nurses to enhance digital literacy and improve clinical decision-making skills

learning_goals: Learners can apply pregnancy risk classification criteria with 85% accuracy using hypermedia content.
Learners can design and implement high-risk maternal care strategies through simulations and case studies.
Learners can document clinical judgment results with 90% reliability using digital assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
